name: Evan McRay
description: Evan McRayis research specialist working forMilitechinCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. In September2068, Evan and his coworkers accessed theCynosure Facilitylocated beneathPacifica,Night City. In2077,Bree Whitneydiscovered information about Evan's research at the Cynosure Facility, involvingAIsand theBlackwall. Anything she found, Bree sold it toNetWatch, who promptly executed Cesar Mijares from Evan's team. Bree continued with her search, which eventually brought her toCynosure Site D. With the help of amercenarycalledV, Bree managed to find out an important portion of Evan's work. Depending...
